title: Jeffrey Peterson
added: On February 10, 2021, Peterson appeared in a cable television news segment.<ref>{{cite news|title=Ariz. whistleblower says ‘SkyBridge’ project has secrets|url=https://www.oann.com/ariz-whistleblower-says-skybridge-project-has-secrets/|newspaper=[[One America News Network|OAN News]]|quote=What exactly are Marco Lopez's ties to the Salinas family of Mexico? This is quite possibly the most controversial political family in the recent political history of Mexico.|date=February 10, 2021|access-date=February 14, 2021}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|title=Ariz. whistleblower says 'SkyBridge' project has secrets|url=https://rumble.com/vdq5vn-ariz.-whistleblower-says-skybridge-project-has-secrets.html|access-date=2021-02-14|website=OAN News on Rumble|language=en}}</ref> The story questioned influence of the [[Institutional Revolutionary Party|Mexican Institutional Revolutionary Party]] on [[Skybridge Arizona]],<ref>{{cite news|title=Mesa takes next step for nation’s only inland port |author=Walsh, Jim |url=https://www.eastvalleytribune.com/news/mesa-takes-next-step-for-nation-s-only-inland-port/article_423e5708-ff26-11e9-82f4-cb4754dd0ee4.html|newspaper=[[East Valley Tribune]]|date=November 5, 2019 |quote=Mexican and U.S customs officials will work together to “pre-clear’’ shipments back and forth between the two countries. A special seal is being developed by Mexico to help expedite shipments. Marco Lopez, president of Intermestic Partners who is working with Mexican entrepreneur Ariel Picker on the project, said the new buildings represent the first steps in building a supply chain.|access-date=February 14, 2021}}</ref> the first [[American (word)|American]] [[Cross-border cooperation|cross-border]] [[logistics|cargo]] [[port]] with 'pre-authorization screening' between the [[United States]] and [[Mexico]].
